DOC.brief_summary: The aim study evaluate effect motivational interviewing ( MI ) improve self-care heart failure ( HF ) patient caregiver contribution HF self-care . Also study evaluate effect MI follow secondary outcome : In HF patient : HF somatic symptom perception , generic specific quality life , anxiety depression , sleep quality , mutuality caregiver , hospitalization , use emergency service , mortality ; In caregiver : generic quality life , anxiety depression , mutuality patient , preparedness , social support sleep quality .
DOC.brief_title: MOTIVATional intErviewing Improve Self-care Heart Failure Patients
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Diagnosis HF ( patient ) , New York Heart Association ( NYHA ) functional class II IV ( patient ) , Inadequate selfcare assess SelfCare Heart Failure Index ( patient ) , Being informal caregiver patient ( caregiver ) . Exclusion criterion : Severe cognitive impairment evaluate Sixitem screener ( patient ) , Acute coronary syndrome last three month ( patient ) , Living residential setting ( e.g. , nurse home ) ( patient ) , Patients willing participate study ( caregiver ) .
